title: When towers daydream?

embed.description: This is "Tower Dive (no turret aggro)" by Lord Sesshomaru on Vimeo, the home for high quality videos and the people who love them.

body:
You all know that feeling when you get tower dived, and it feels like the tower isn't helping, and you feel robbed when they get away.
But of course no one believes you and you can never prove it, and in the end you just convince yourself that you must have read the situation wrong.

Well, believe it now....
Ive spent a long time going over this, and I honestly have no idea why it wasn't attacking us. 
We were both directly under it, clearly attacking Lux.

Like she probably wouldn't have gotten any kills or anything, but she must have felt so utterly abandoned...

Whats going on here?

replies.body: I agree with Seras here, Its not like just a visual bug its a game changing bug, It has happened to me before where I walk under tower in an empty lane with a full wave and the agro just chops from the cannon creep without it dying and instantly has a hard on for me. Its rather annoying.

That's one I'd recommend chucking onto the Report a Bug board over on NA, especially since you have video evidence (just remember to read the formatting rules for the board since they're pretty specific). I suspect that HeartVine is right, but I would say it's unintended because it interrupts the expected turret aggro, it's unpredictability that really shouldn't be there so definitely worth the post.
Ok ill flip it over to the bug report section tomorrow. ^^

I knew I wasn't going crazy! They all said I was going crazy, but I knew they were wrong!

I'm already crazy, after all...

Anyway, I *think* I can explain this just a little bit. If I'm not mistaken, the towers didn't attack because of the invulnerability provided by Taric, then once that ended Lux was one attack from dying, and I've found turrets don't do anything if someone "one-shots" a low health enemy under their turret.

http://static.srcdn.com/wp-content/uploads/Joker-Laugh-Killing-Joke.jpg

xD

I thought that as well, but I don't see why thy wouldn't attack if you are invulnerable.
Im pretty sure they still attack Kayle _(untested though)_.

I know it's definitely untargetablity they they don't attack, but Taric is still 'targetable' he's just invincible. cos he's so manly!
I just have no idea xD
